event.description:
Bored of partying in holed up banquet rooms in star hotels?! Then look no further...

We provide multiple spaces to accommodate groups of 25pax minimum to 800pax - for private get-together's , cocktail dinners and corporate meet n greets. 


To get quote email us - enquiries@bangalorebrewworks.com
OR Call us on - 78995-22277

location.address: The Paul Bangalore, 139/28, Opposite Embassy Golf Links, Off Intermediate Ring Road, Domlur, Bangalore

event.title: Oktoberfest at Murphy's Brewhouse
event.description:
Oktoberfest, world's biggest Volkfest, is an important part of Bavarian culture since early 1800s. This Munich event is widely celebrated by all the beer lovers all over the world.
Murphy's Brewhouse, being the first Irish microbrewery in Bangalore, celebrates Oktoberfest with a lot of festivities. We have a Munich Lager waiting for you true to the German tradition of the fest and also a darker Bavarian Bock to bring in more fun. 
Munich Lager is a typical German classic beer with an elegant hoppy note and has a malty taste, while Bavarian Bock has intense malt notes combined with roasted malts and bitterness contributed by German aromatic hops. Pair these brews with a special Oktpberfest food menu suggested by our master brewer.
Sociai media contests, Bavarian music, live food counters, surprise gifts and a hell lot of deals. What more do you need to have fun during Oktoberfest!
Book a table at 080 404 777 77
